summary: This document is an email chain from September 2021 between a Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office and an unnamed recipient, arranging a call to discuss the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing investigative or oversight activity related to the case years after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, DOJ Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: The sender/recipient of emails arranging a call to discuss the Epstein case. Works for the DOJ OIG New York Field Office.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who, along with the Special Agent, wishes to speak with the email recipient regarding the Epstein case.

connections.description: They are both involved in arranging a call regarding the Epstein case, suggesting they are working together on the matter.

events.title: Call Arranged re: Epstein Case
events.description: A Special Agent from the DOJ OIG arranges a call for 1:30 PM to discuss the Epstein case with an unnamed recipient.

events.title: Initial Request for Call
events.description: The Special Agent initially requests a call with the recipient and SSA to discuss the Epstein case.

locations.name: New York Field Office
locations.context: Office of the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General, located in New York, NY 10004.

locations.name: New York, NY 10004
locations.context: The location of the DOJ OIG New York Field Office involved in the correspondence.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office was actively involved in matters related to the Epstein case as of September 2021.
The correspondence shows coordination between a Special Agent and a Supervisory Special Agent (SSA) to discuss the case with an external party.
The document indicates investigative or oversight activity concerning the Epstein case continued years after Jeffrey Epstein's death in 2019.
